thread.section_title: Hotel le Chat Noir - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Last minute weekend break
thread.title_full: Last minute weekend break - Review of Hotel le Chat Noir, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Richard S
title: Last minute weekend break
text: Small hotel easy to miss, next to restaurant of the same name. Reception is on 1st floor. Very helpful receptionist , with free upgrade. This area is very lively with some sex shops around but no hassle from these. Well placed to visit places this side of the seine. Spacious room, comfy bed and sheets. You can make tea, hair dryer (does not work in bathroom!) We would definitely go there again
